General.Name: Lingbao Gold Group Company Ltd
General.Description: Lingbao Gold Group Company Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in gold mining, smelting, and refining in the People's Republic of China. The company's products include gold bullion, silver, copper products, sulphuric acid, and others. It holds 35 mining and exploration rights with an area of 240.75 square kilometers. The company is also involved in the sale of mineral products, jewelry, machinery, equipment, and components for gold processing; mine engineering construction; and design of mineral engineering. In addition, it imports and exports gold products. The company was formerly known as Lingbao Gold Company Ltd. and changed its name to Lingbao Gold Group Company Ltd. in May 2017. Lingbao Gold Group Company Ltd. was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Unit 1104, Leighton Centre, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
